biotools.summary: Software tool for systematic discovery of miRNA modules from a set of predefined miRNA target sites. Given a sets of miRNA binding sites, miRModule efficiently identifies groups of miRNAs, whose binding sites significantly co-occur in the same set of target mRNAs, as putative miRNA modules.

bioschemas.name: miRModule
